title: Login as club admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as test-MIN-admin/tear?LIKE
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks login button
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to main roster home page

title: Navigate to Minor Contracts > Addendum C
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Minor Contracts on left Nav
AND selects Addendum C from the popup menu
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to a page with the Add C widget

title: Choose preliminary add c and enter salary
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the Add C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user filters the widget by Preliminary/Not created
custom_expected: THEN user can view preliminary and not created Add Cs

title: Click Edit and Save an Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has located a preliminary Add C
AND has clicked the pencil icon on the left
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in date signed and salaries for levels of plays
AND clicks SAVE
custom_expected:
THEN the Add C is updated
AND the status is updated to preliminary

title: Click Upload Icon to attach a form
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has saved a preliminary Add C
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks upward arrow icon
AND selects a PDF file from computer to upload
custom_expected:
THEN the file is uploaded and attached to selected Add C
AND the arrow tuns into a paperclip icon

title: Club can tender an Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN club has saved a preliminary Add C
ANd has attached a file
custom_steps:
WHEN club user checks box to the left of players name
AND clicks tender button
custom_expected: THEN the Add C is updated to Tendered status

title: Login as boc approver
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as test_boc_approver/pass@HEARD
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks login
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the homepage

title: Go to minor contracts > Add C widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Minor Contracts > AddendumC widget
AND filters it by CLUB/STATUS
custom_expected: THEN user is able to view all Add Cs for selected club and selected status

title: Locate tendered Add C and approve
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in 
and has located the previously tendered ADD C
custom_steps:
WHEN user checks the box to the left of selected Add C
AND clicks approve button
custom_expected: THEN the addendum C is updated to approved

title: Login as BOC approver
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks login
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the homepage

title: Locate Add C widget and locate a tendered add c
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Minor Contracts > Add C widget
AND filters by "tendered"
custom_expected: THEN user is able to view all previously tendered Add Cs

title: Check box and click return to club
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has located a previously tendered ADD C
custom_steps:
WHEN user checks the box to the left
AND clicks on "Return to Club" button
custom_expected: THEN the Add C updates to preliminary status

title: Login as club admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as CLUB ADMIN (test-min-admin/tear?LIKE)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks login
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to homepage

title: Navigate to quicksearch and select domestic amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to quicksearch (topright textbox)
AND selects 'domestic amateur' from available radio buttons
AND types in a last name (i.e. Johnson)
custom_expected: THEN user is able to select from a list of domestic amateur players in the system

title: From profile, click Create new and select Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a domestic amateur player
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks create new button from the profile
AND selects Contract > Minor Contract
custom_expected: THEN a new preliminary FIRST YEAR DOMESTIC contract opens up for user to edit

title: Fill in required fields and click submit
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a preliminary Minor Contract for a dom player
custom_steps:
WHEN user edits these fields
ORG > MIN
Club > Rochester Red Wings
Addendum B > College Scholarship Program (fill in required fields with any values)
Addendum C > Click Enter Salary and select "default domestic" and click apply
Addendum F > Any State
Execution of Contract > Fill in Authorized Signatory
Attached Files > Select any PDF and label it Contract
AND user clicks SUBMIT
custom_expected:
THEN the contract updates from preliminary to terms submitted
AND club user is no longer able to edit the contract (can only edit comments)

title: Login as a club admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as test-min-admin/tear?LIKE
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks login
custom_expected: THEN user is taken the homepage

title: Nvigate to quicksearch and locate a professional player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club admin
custom_steps:
WHEN user locates quicksearch box
AND ensures radio button is set to "professional player"
AND searches for a player (i.e. Johnson)
custom_expected: THEN the system will display results for professional players

title: From player profile click on create new and select minor contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected a professional player with no prior MNC (or free agent)
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on create new icon
AND selects Contract > Minor Contract
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary non first year contract contract opens

title: Fill in required fields and click submit
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a preliminary non first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in following fields
ORG > MIN
CLUB > Any
Addendum B > Release clause (toggle to YES and fill in required fields with any values)
Addendum C > Enter Salary > Select Default Alien and apply
Addendum F > Any state
Execution of Contract > Fill in Authorized Signatory with any name ont he dropdown
Attached Files > Attach any PDF and label it

WHEN user clicks SUBMIT
custom_expected:
THEN MNC is updated to terms submitted
AND cannot be edited (except comments and auth signatory)

title: Login as BOC approver and locate pending approvals widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC Approver
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the clipboard icon
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the pending approvals widget

title: Locate a terms submitted MNC (can use one from prior test case) and terms accept MNC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has located the pending approvals widget
AND has located a previously terms submitted MNC
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects the checkbox from the left
AND clicks TERMS ACCEPT
custom_expected: THEN the MNC updates to terms accepted

title: Locate roster and ensure player is pending active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has terms accepted a players MNC
AND has navigated back to the rosters tab > Minor League Roster
custom_steps:
WHEN user filters by the club the player was assigned to (i.e. MIN)
AND searches for player by name
custom_expected: THEN user can see that the player is pending active on the roster for the club he was assigned to

title: Locate the same MNC and approve
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user navigates back to pending approvals clipboard
AND locates previously terms accepted MNC
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the MNC to open it
AND pre approves it
AND approves it
custom_expected: THEN the MNC is updated to approved status

title: Return to roster page and ensure player is active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has approved the prior MNC
AND has navigated back to the Minor League Roster
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects the ORG and CLUB the player has been assigned to
AND searches for the player by name
custom_expected: THEN user can see that player is now active on the roster

title: Login as club admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as test-MIN-admin/tear?LIKE
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks login
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the homepage

title: Navigate to quicksearch and search for intl amateur
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user locates the quicksearch
AND changes radio button to International Amateur
AND searches for a last name (i.e. Florez)
custom_expected: THEN system will display a set of international amateur players

title: Open profile and click create new and select Minor Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has selected an intl amateur player
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens players profile
AND clicks create new icon
AND selects Contracts > Minor Contract
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary contract opens for intl first year

title: Fill in required fields and click submit
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a preliminary Intl First Year Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in these fields - 
Permanent Address, City, State, ZIP (any values)
ORG, Club > MIN, Any club
Addendum B > Contingency Bonus > Fill in required fields with any values
Addendum C > Click Enter Salary and choose default Alien and apply
Addendum F > Any state
Execution of Contract > Choose any Authorized Signatory
Attached Files > Upload any PDF and label it contract

WHEN user clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN the MNC is updated to terms submitted
AND user cannot edit it (except comments and signatory section)

title: Login as BOC approver and locate pending approvals widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on clipboard icon
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the pending approvals widget

title: Locate a minor contract with status of terms accepted
custom_preconds: GIVEN has located the pending approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN user searches for a terms accepted contract (may use MNC from prior test case)
custom_expected: THEN user is able to locate a terms accepted MNC

title: Click on Return to Club button
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has located a terms accepted MNC
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the MNC to open it
AND user scrolls down to the buttons
AND user clicks on arrow icon on the 'preapprove' button
AND user selects "return to club" option
custom_expected: THEN the contract is updated to a status of "update terms accepted"

title: Pre approve and Return to club (same MNC)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is sitll logged in as BOC approver
AND has just set an MNC to update terms accepted
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Submit to BOC (override any warnings)
AND user clicks Pre approve
AND user clicks arrow icon and clicks Return to Club option again
custom_expected: THEN the MNC once again returns to a state of Update Terms Accepted

title: Login as club and ensure the MNC appears on notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in test-MIN-admin
AND user clicks on the clipboard icon to view Action Items Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user locates the action items widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Update Terms accepted MNC should appear for the club user under Action Items Widget 
AND the notification has a description " contract sent bck for updating"

title: Click on MNC and ensure club can make edit and resubmit to BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN club user has located the MNC that has been returned by BOC
AND has clicked on the link to open the MNC
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens the MNC
AND makes any edit
AND clicks submit to BOC
custom_expected: THEN the contract is resubmitted to BOC

title: Login as BOC approver and locate pending approvals widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC approver
AND is on the homepage
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on clipboard Icon
custom_expected: THEN user is able to view the pending approvals widget

title: Locate a MNC that is *not* approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the pending approvals widget
custom_steps: WHEN user filters for MINOR CONTRACT
custom_expected: THEN user is able to view all pending minor contracts

title: Open the MNC and Click Reject Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has located a pending MNC (terms submitted/terms accepted)
AND has clicked on the contract link to open it
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks reject button
custom_expected:
THEN the MNC is updated to rejected status
AND user has a delete option available

title: Click Delete Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has rejected previously selected MNC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks DELETE
custom_expected: THEN the MNC is deleted and cannot be found in the system
